languages.text: "Когда я рассказал тебе о смерти своих братьев, Арнульфа и Скьядди, ты отдал{mf||а} должное их отваге, и я на мгновение будто очутился дома, на Фенрисе. И я захотел вернуться туда".
"When I told you of the death of my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you paid tribute to their valour, and for a moment I felt as if I were back home on Fenris. And I wanted to return there."
languages.original_text: "Когда я рассказал тебе о смерти своих братьев, Арнульфа и Скьядди, ты отдал{mf||а} должное их отваге, и я на мгновение будто очутился дома, на Фенрисе. И я захотел вернуться туда".

traits.locale_text: "When I told you of the death of my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you paid tribute to their valour, and for a moment I felt as if I were back home on Fenris. And I wanted to return there."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When I told you of the death of my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you paid tribute to their valour, and for a moment I felt as if I were back home on Fenris. And I wanted to return there."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When I told you of the death of my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you paid tribute to their valour, and for a moment I felt as if I were back home on Fenris. And I wanted to return there."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Cuando le hablé de la muerte de mis hermanos Arnoolf y Skyaddi, homenajeó su valor. Por un momento pensé que estaba de vuelta en Fenris. Y quise volver».
languages.original_text: "When I told you of the death of my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you paid tribute to their valour, and for a moment I felt as if I were back home on Fenris. And I wanted to return there."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando le hablé de la muerte de mis hermanos Arnoolf y Skyaddi, homenajeó su valor. Por un momento pensé que estaba de vuelta en Fenris. Y quise volver».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “当我告诉你我的兄弟阿努尔夫和海加迪的死讯时，你对他们的英勇表示了敬意。那一刻，我感觉仿佛回到了芬里斯的故乡，我想再次回到那里。”
languages.original_text: "When I told you of the death of my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you paid tribute to their valour, and for a moment I felt as if I were back home on Fenris. And I wanted to return there."

traits.locale_text: “当我告诉你我的兄弟阿努尔夫和海加迪的死讯时，你对他们的英勇表示了敬意。那一刻，我感觉仿佛回到了芬里斯的故乡，我想再次回到那里。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「アーノルフとスキアディの死について話した時、あんたは彼らの勇気に敬意を表してくれた。俺は一瞬フェンリスの故郷に戻ったかのような気分になったよ。俺は、あそこに戻りたかったんだ」
languages.original_text: "When I told you of the death of my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you paid tribute to their valour, and for a moment I felt as if I were back home on Fenris. And I wanted to return there."

traits.locale_text: 「アーノルフとスキアディの死について話した時、あんたは彼らの勇気に敬意を表してくれた。俺は一瞬フェンリスの故郷に戻ったかのような気分になったよ。俺は、あそこに戻りたかったんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Quand je vous ai annoncé la mort de mes frères Arnoolf et Skyaddi, vous avez rendu hommage à leur bravoure et, l'espace d'un instant, j'ai eu le sentiment d'être de retour chez moi, sur Fenris. Et je me suis rendu compte à quel point mon monde me manquait. »
languages.original_text: "When I told you of the death of my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you paid tribute to their valour, and for a moment I felt as if I were back home on Fenris. And I wanted to return there."

traits.locale_text: « Quand je vous ai annoncé la mort de mes frères Arnoolf et Skyaddi, vous avez rendu hommage à leur bravoure et, l'espace d'un instant, j'ai eu le sentiment d'être de retour chez moi, sur Fenris. Et je me suis rendu compte à quel point mon monde me manquait. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Als ich Euch vom Tod meiner Brüder Arnoolf und Skyaddi berichtet habe, habt Ihr ihrer Tapferkeit Tribut gezollt, und einen Augenblick lang hat es sich angefühlt, als sei ich wieder zu Hause auf Fenris. Und ich wollte dorthin zurückkehren."
languages.original_text: "When I told you of the death of my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you paid tribute to their valour, and for a moment I felt as if I were back home on Fenris. And I wanted to return there."

traits.locale_text: "Als ich Euch vom Tod meiner Brüder Arnoolf und Skyaddi berichtet habe, habt Ihr ihrer Tapferkeit Tribut gezollt, und einen Augenblick lang hat es sich angefühlt, als sei ich wieder zu Hause auf Fenris. Und ich wollte dorthin zurückkehren."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "When I told you of the death of my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you paid tribute to their valour, and for a moment I felt as if I were back home on Fenris. And I wanted to return there."

languages.text: "Sana kardeşlerim Arnoolf ve Skyaddi'nin öldüğünü söylediğimde onların cesaretini takdir etmiştin. Bir anlığına Fenris'e, yuvama dönmüş gibi hissetmiştim. Oraya dönmek istedim."
languages.original_text: "When I told you of the death of my brothers Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you paid tribute to their valour, and for a moment I felt as if I were back home on Fenris. And I wanted to return there."

traits.locale_text: "Sana kardeşlerim Arnoolf ve Skyaddi'nin öldüğünü söylediğimde onların cesaretini takdir etmiştin. Bir anlığına Fenris'e, yuvama dönmüş gibi hissetmiştim. Oraya dönmek istemiştim."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
